chapter.title: Working with Requirements
chapter.para: This chapter shows you how to create a project and add requirements to it. Requel doesn’t impose any particular process for creating requirements, which makes it flexible, but the flexibility may make it harder for you to get started if you don’t have a process for gathering requirements in mind. If you don’t have a process in mind, you may want to start with stories to describe the behavior of the system.
In any case, to start you will need to create a project and the stakeholders that will work on the requirements.
